author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Golden Bridge Investment & Securities to issue 1st series convertible bonds worth 40 bln won
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Golden Bridge Investment & Securities Co Ltd :
* Says it will issue 1st series unregistered and unsecured private convertible bonds, to raise 40 billion won in proceeds for operations
* Maturity date is May 30, 2023, coupon rate is 1 percent and yield to maturity is 1 percent for the bonds
* Conversion price is 1,145 won/share and conversion ratio is 100 percent
Source text in Korean: goo.gl/pv8UnL
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
